ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t read very carefully, but I thought he was standing on the wing, near the edge, facing Tyreal who was perhaps 10 yards away, but let s just say SS

I didn't read very carefully, but I thought he was
standing on the wing, near the edge, facing Tyreal who
was perhaps 10 yards away, but let's just say SS never
got to Megatron (I said attempted) and the fire took
him out first, but now I think you have to deal with
the little bit of remaining fire, because he was
fairly close and some of it might stray towards
Megatron.

--- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote:
> Kyle, I think we're seeing the battle differently.
> 
> I was trying to say that Megatron is leaning with
> his back to the 
> ship, on top of the wing, and i saw Tyrael's
> position as being on 
> the other side of the base, across from where
> Megatron was. So 
> Megatron would be hiding and poking his weapons over
> to fire at the 
> moment, having some protection against weaponfire. 
> 
> Essentially, SS couldn't have gotten behind him,
> grabbed his wrist 
> (which would be a mode anyway), and fired a laser at
> the back of his 
> neck etc. I guess I need to work on my posting some
> more then to 
> make stuff like that clearer.
> 
> This is, of course, provided that Tyrael is where I
> had thought he 
> was. If not, we have a minor problem. =p
> 
>
